basSonetMib.name: basSonetMib
basSonetMib.contactinfo: Tech Support Broadband Access Systems 4 Technology Drive Westborough, MA 01581 U.S.A. 508-366-8833 support@basystems.com
basSonetMib.description: This MIB module defines the configuration and status MIB objects for a Broadband Access System SONET interface.

basSonetPathTable.name: basSonetPathTable
basSonetPathTable.description: A table containing SONET Path specific variables for this POS implementation.

basSonetPathEntry.name: basSonetPathEntry
basSonetPathEntry.description: Management information about a particular POS Link.

basSonetPathB3Err.name: basSonetPathB3Err
basSonetPathB3Err.description: The number of packets received on this link with B3 bit errors. Bit Interleaved Parity 8 is calculated over all bits in the SPE of each frame.

basSonetPathG1Err.name: basSonetPathG1Err
basSonetPathG1Err.description: The number of B3 errors that were detected by the remote terminal in its received signal.

basSonetPathPais.name: basSonetPathPais
basSonetPathPais.description: The number of times a Path Alarm Indication Signal has been detected. A PAIS occurs if all the H1/H2 pointer bytes in the received SONET frame are 01.

basSonetPathPrdi.name: basSonetPathPrdi
basSonetPathPrdi.description: The number of times a Path Remote Defect Indication has been detected. A PRDI occurs if bits 5,6 and 7 of the G1 byte received with the same value for 5 onsecutive frames.

basSonetPathPlop.name: basSonetPathPlop
basSonetPathPlop.description: The number of times a Path Loss of Pointer has been detected. A PLOP occurs if all the H1/H2 pointer bytes in the received SONET frame are not all 01 indicating PRDI or the first pair equals 00 and all other pairs equaling 11 indicating normal operation.

basSonetPathB3Threshold.name: basSonetPathB3Threshold
basSonetPathB3Threshold.description: The number of packets received with B3 errors hits this threshold issue an alarm.

basSonetPathRxJ1.name: basSonetPathRxJ1
basSonetPathRxJ1.description: The first J1 byte received in last packet.

basSonetPathRxC2.name: basSonetPathRxC2
basSonetPathRxC2.description: C2 byte received in last packet.

basSonetPathRxG1.name: basSonetPathRxG1
basSonetPathRxG1.description: G1 byte received in last packet.

basSonetLineTable.name: basSonetLineTable
basSonetLineTable.description: A table containing SONET Line specific variables for this POS implementation.

basSonetLineEntry.name: basSonetLineEntry
basSonetLineEntry.description: Management information about a particular POS Link.

basSonetLineTxErr.name: basSonetLineTxErr
basSonetLineTxErr.description: The sum of all transmit errors that caused the packet to not be transmitted. These errors consist of tx fifo error, link layer errors, minimum packet size violations, maximum packet size violations and tx parity errors.

basSonetLineB1Err.name: basSonetLineB1Err
basSonetLineB1Err.description: The number of packets received on this link with B1 bit errors. Bit Interleaved Parity 8 is calculated over all bytes of each frame.

basSonetLineB2Err.name: basSonetLineB2Err
basSonetLineB2Err.description: The number of packets received on this link with B2 bit errors. Bit Interleaved Parity 8 is calculated over all bytes of each frame except for the first three rows of the TOH

basSonetLineM1Err.name: basSonetLineM1Err
basSonetLineM1Err.description: The number of B2 errors that were detected by the remote terminal in its received signal.

basSonetLineRxFifoOverflow.name: basSonetLineRxFifoOverflow
basSonetLineRxFifoOverflow.description: The number of packets received on this link with an error detected in the receive fifo.

basSonetLineRxAbort.name: basSonetLineRxAbort
basSonetLineRxAbort.description: The number of packets received on this link in which the abort sequence is detected.

basSonetLineRxRunts.name: basSonetLineRxRunts
basSonetLineRxRunts.description: The number of packets received on this link which are smaller than the minimum packet size.

basSonetLineLoc.name: basSonetLineLoc
basSonetLineLoc.description: The number of times a loss of clock has been detected. LOC occurs if no transitions are detected on the receive SONET clock for 16 periods of the transmit clock..

basSonetLineLof.name: basSonetLineLof
basSonetLineLof.description: The number of times a loss of frame has been detected. LOF occurs if RX_OOF (out-of-frame) is active continuously for 24 consecutive frames (3 ms).

basSonetLineLos.name: basSonetLineLos
basSonetLineLos.description: The number of times a loss of signal has been detected. A LOS indicates to the framer that there is no signal present from the optical receiver.

basSonetLineLais.name: basSonetLineLais
basSonetLineLais.description: The number of times a Line Alarm Indication Signal has been detected. A LAIS occurs if the 3 LSBs of K2 are received as '111' for 5 consecutive frames

basSonetLineLrdi.name: basSonetLineLrdi
basSonetLineLrdi.description: The number of times a Line Remote Defect Indication has been detected. A LRDI occurs if the 3 LSBs of K2 are not received as '110' for 5 consecutive frames.

basSonetLineB1Threshold.name: basSonetLineB1Threshold
basSonetLineB1Threshold.description: The number of packets received with B1 errors hits this threshold issue an alarm.

basSonetLineB2Threshold.name: basSonetLineB2Threshold
basSonetLineB2Threshold.description: The number of packets received with B2 errors hits this threshold issue an alarm.

basSonetLineSFThreshold.name: basSonetLineSFThreshold
basSonetLineSFThreshold.description: The number of packets received with B2 errors hits this threshold issue a signal fail alarm.

basSonetLineSDThreshold.name: basSonetLineSDThreshold
basSonetLineSDThreshold.description: The number of packets received with B2 errors hits this threshold issue a signal degrade alarm.

basSonetLineLastCleared.name: basSonetLineLastCleared
basSonetLineLastCleared.description: The value of sysUpTime when these Counter32s were last cleared.

basSonetLineRxK1.name: basSonetLineRxK1
basSonetLineRxK1.description: K1 byte received in last packet.

basSonetLineRxK2.name: basSonetLineRxK2
basSonetLineRxK2.description: K2 byte received in last packet.

basSonetLineRxGiants.name: basSonetLineRxGiants
basSonetLineRxGiants.description: The number of packets received on this link which are larger than the maximum packet size.
